r.d: This extension provides an IBM database driver for PDO. This driver supports IBM DB2 Universal Database, IBM Cloudscape, and Apache Derby databases.
r.n: Minor release to fix formatting and remove generic non-PDO_IBM code New Feature: Added support for lastInsertId() method New Feature: Added support for PDO::ATTR_SERVER_INFO connection attribute Improved unit test coverage for DB2 and IDS 11
